sentences.en: He cast a sly glance at his bridge partner.
sentences.cn: 他向桥牌搭档使了个会意的眼色.

sentences.en: He gave me a sly, meaningful look.
sentences.cn: 他心照不宣地看了我一眼，意味深长。

sentences.en: He leaned forward with a sly smile.
sentences.cn: 他俯身向前诡秘地一笑。

sentences.en: He's a sly old beggar if ever there was one.
sentences.cn: 他确确实实是个老奸巨猾的家伙。

sentences.en: His lips were spread in a sly smile.
sentences.cn: 他心照不宣地咧嘴一笑。

sentences.en: I was ready to sly out the alley door.
sentences.cn: 我准备从那边小门溜出去.

sentences.en: People consider foxes as clever but sly animals.
sentences.cn: 人们认为狐狸是既聪明又狡猾的动物.

sentences.en: She darted a sly sideways glance at Bramwell.
sentences.cn: 她狡黠地从眼角瞥了布拉姆韦尔一眼。

sentences.en: She is devious and sly and manipulative.
She picked up the new nylon umbrella on the sly.
sentences.cn: 她顺手牵羊拿走了那顶新尼龙伞.

sentences.en: Some boys smoke on the sly.
That sly guy stole the cake while the cook's back was turned.
sentences.cn: 那狡猾的家伙趁厨师转过身把蛋糕偷走了.

sentences.en: The sly fox nimbly eluded the dogs.
sentences.cn: 那只狡猾的狐狸灵活地躲避开那群狗.

sentences.en: They’d been seeing each other on the sly for months.
sentences.cn: 他们已经偷偷约会了好几个月。

sentences.en: took extra payments on the sly.
Was she meeting some guy on the sly?
sentences.cn: 她是不是偷偷地在见什么人？

sentences.en: You can't trust him; he's a sly old fox.
sentences.cn: 你不能相信他, 他是一只狡猾的老狐狸.

phrases.tran_cn: 诡秘的，偷偷的：试图逃避注意力的方法

trans.tran_cn: 狡猾的，狡诈的，暗中的，偷偷摸摸的，顽皮的，淘气的，<方>灵活的，巧妙的
trans.tran_en: someone who is sly cleverly deceives people in order to get what they want
